title: Tutorial wont work.
body:
I have been playing the game a lot recently and one of my friends was interested in learning how to play and maybe getting their own account, So I decided I'd set them up in a tutorial on my account. It all went smoothly until we entered the actual game where the tutorial occurs and then nothing would work. My internet was fine my computer was fine just nothing was working I couldn't click on the shop to get the starting item (As the tutorial told) all that would happen is when I would hover my cursor over things it would give me a description, After around 10 minutes of sitting around the message that said I've been disconnected for too long and the game will now exit. even though my ping was low and the game wasn't trying to reconnect. This has happened multiple times. I'm not sure if it's the new client or just my computer.

Cheers.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I just tested and am able to complete a tutorial game just fine.

Are you still experiencing this issue?
It was really odd I think the game froze or something cause after around 1 hour of waiting I was able to continue and finish it
